description: Here's how to make Costco's chicken bakes at home. They're filled with tender chicken, cheese, and Caesar dressing all in a tender, golden crust.
headline: Recipe: Costco Chicken Bakes

HowtoTip.text: Storage: Refrigerate leftovers in an airtight container for up to 4 days.

name: Recipe: Costco Chicken Bakes
recipeIngredient: 1 pound pizza dough, thawed if frozen and at room temperature 1 hour
1/2 cup creamy Caesar dressing, divided, plus more for brushing
1 cup crumbled thick-cut bacon (about 6 cooked slices), divided
1 1/2 cups shredded Italian blend cheese, divided

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange a rack in the middle of the oven and heat to 400°F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper and set aside.

Divide the pizza dough into 4 equal pieces. Roll each piece into a 5x7-inch rectangle about 1/4-inch thick. Position the rectangles so that a long side is facing you. Brush each with 2 tablespoons of the Caesar dressing, leaving a 1/2-inch border. Scatter 1/2 cup of the chicken, 1/4 cup of the bacon, and 1/4 cup of the cheese over the dressing on each rectangle.

Starting with the long side closest to you, roll one of the doughs up tightly into a log. Pinch the seam and the ends closed. Place seam-side down on the prepared baking sheet. Repeat with the remaining doughs.
Brush the top and sides of each chicken bake with more Caesar dressing. Sprinkle the remaining 1/2 cup of cheese evenly over the top of the chicken bakes.
Bake until golden-brown, 15 to 17 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes on the baking sheet before serving.

video.description: Costco's food court has quite the reputation. The $1.50 hot dog combo and robot-built pizza slices get all the press, so maybe you missed the true winner on the menu board: the chicken bake, of course! Chunky chicken pieces tossed with bits of bacon and creamy Caesar dressing, wrapped stromboli-style in pizza dough — the sleeper hit of Costco's food court was steeped in mystery, until recently, and now you can actually make them at home.
video.name: Better Than Costco Chicken Bakes
